QuestData.Title: Against Their Will
QuestData.Description: When the naga brought me down here, I saw many of my vrykul mining the sea floor. They had... squids... attached to their faces.$B$BWhatever those things are, they must be controlling my kin and forcing them to work for the naga.$B$BI do not know what will happen if you remove the squids, but I would rather my vrykul die than be slaves to the naga.$B$BSee me in Jandvik when the deed is done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Remove Writhing Willbreakers from 6 Possessed Vrykul in Azuregale Bay.
QuestData.RewardText: I must express gratitude for the vrykul you have saved this day.
